mapper.insert: insert into agency_base ( agency_name, sys_user_name, sys_user_password, mobilePhone, email, open_id, is_cooperation, city, location, address, create_time, update_time, is_del ) values ( #{agencyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysUserPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isCooperation,jdbcType=Integer}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), 0 )
mapper.select: select id, agency_name as agencyName, sys_user_name as sysUserName, sys_user_password as sysUserPassword, mobilePhone as mobilePhone, email as email, open_id as openId, is_cooperation as isCooperation, city, location, address, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, is_del as isDel from agency_base where is_del = 0 limit #{start},#{length}
